_sText:
Hi, Finnaly i end the bug hunt and adjust the gameplay. Their will be an another version later with gameplay improvement, but no new games. List of changes: -Race of light: first level has been redesign
-lotto: no more blocked lvl, but a new bonus.
-Maze: particles fixed
-tetris: level balanced and CT can play
-Skipping rope: speed fixed, doors fixed
-cavern: all displacement has been remade
-pool: purple light added to help warden
-death race ligth added to help players
-HDR fixed
And a lot of fix and balance i forgot. I know their still bugs/incoherences; but i havent the time to fix all of them. Maybe in the last version.
I creat a new thread because player HAVE TO change their version: the v3a is full of little bugs.
